name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and our signature sauce.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A traditional Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and a crispy crust.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic pasta dish with creamy sauce, crispy pancetta, and grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with lemon butter sauce and vegetables.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

name: French Fries
description: Golden crispy fries served with ketchup and special seasoning.

name: Iced Caramel Latte
description: Chilled espresso with caramel syrup, milk, and ice, topped with whipped cream.

name: Fresh Orange Juice
description: Freshly squeezed orange juice with no added sugar or preservatives.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: A refreshing blend of fresh mango, yogurt, and honey for a creamy delight.

name: Lemon Iced Tea
description: Freshly brewed black tea with lemon slices and ice, slightly sweetened.

name: Strawberry Milkshake
description: Creamy milkshake made with fresh strawberries, milk, and vanilla ice cream.

name: Chocolate Brownie
description: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownie topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Blueberry Cheesecake
description: Creamy cheesecake with a buttery crust, topped with fresh blueberries and syrup.

name: Tiramisu
description: Italian coffee-flavored dessert with layers of mascarpone cheese and cocoa powder.

name: Apple Pie
description: Classic homemade apple pie with cinnamon-spiced apple filling and flaky crust.

name: Panna Cotta
description: Italian-style creamy dessert with a hint of vanilla and fresh berry topping.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Rich and creamy hot chocolate topped with whipped cream and cocoa powder.

name: Matcha Latte
description: Smooth and creamy matcha green tea latte with frothed milk and a touch of honey.

name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
description: Grilled chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and mayo in a toasted bun.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Crispy pizza crust topped with pepperoni slices, mozzarella cheese, and tomato sauce.
